nodes.text: The Imperial Execution Logs were documents that contained a list of people who had been executed for opposing the Empire dating back to shortly after the Declaration of a New Order. According to then-Admiral Wullf Yularen in the official field guide for the Imperial Military, the Imperial Handbook: A Commander's Guide, the execution logs were graphic enough in the descriptions of their executions that only those who have a strong stomach were recommended to read it, and that those who were executed included some of the Separatists during the Clone Wars.
